block.para: Shows how to use the &Python3long; with the &RDSlong; (&RDS;) API and &AWS; Chalice to create a REST API backed by an &AURlong; database. The web service is fully serverless and represents a simple lending library where patrons can borrow and return books. Learn how to:

listitem.para: Create and manage a serverless &AUR; database cluster.
Implement a data storage layer that uses &RDS; to move data into and out of the database.
Use &AWS; Chalice to deploy a serverless REST API to &ABPlong; and &LAMlong;.
Use the Requests package to send requests to the web service.

block.para: For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
